name: Flying Truck Flight Driving
description:
Welcome to Flying Truck Flight Driving and Racing in air and fly your helicopter truck in the sky with biggest open world Flying Truck Simulator.In this crazy game you will be flying Monster truck , helicopter tractor , american truck and airplane farming truck .If you Want to Drive Extreme Transformer Truck and try your flight driving skills then this game is for you with different vehicles! You can test your air craft pilot skills , truck and jet car driving ability at the same time.Transport fruits and vegetables from city and town with this flying farming simulation game.

Test your airplane pilot skills and motor driving ability at the same time.Do you love pickup games? Maybe drifting in a dirty rally road? Flying Truck Flight Driving is totally different than classic pickup service vehicles games!Feel like in the future with this futuristic flying truck driving .flying on machines in the air is not a dream anymore.Fly your plane truck around the city discover new landscapes, Drive your flying farming truck do stunts and drifts ! Be the best truck driver!

If you are a fanatic fan of flying bus,flying car, dragons and muscle carriage driving games then download this free flying motor game today.You should play our flying police bike and flying police car simulator.Freestyle parking with extreme Turbo service vehicles.Be the best pilot and enjoy an invigorating flying truck simulator with the blend of adventurous flying games in one of the best flying games.Take control, guide and steer the Flying tractor and Monster truck through every way-points to be sure you arrive at the correct destination.

FLYING TRUCK FLIGHT DRIVING GAME FEATURES:

✔ Test your Flying Truck Driving Skills
✔ Improve Airplane Flight Ability
✔ Stunning HD Graphics with city and town
✔ Airplane flying truck and helicopter tractor
✔ Beautiful Mountains and rivers
✔ Easy and Free to use
✔ Realistic and dynamic auto physics
✔ Advanced helicopter flight physics
✔ No WiFi? No Problem.
✔ Offline Play

Get ready to enjoy an invigorating flying heavy vehicle simulator with the blend of adventurous flying games in one of the best flying games.Avoid crashing into the skyscrapers of the city buildings.This game is for all ages who like to do adventures, infect your kids will also love this game.This game does not include massive jumps, mid-air hoops, floating platforms, spiral roadways and outlandish maneuvers.Flying Helicopter Truck Flight Driving is perfect for you!Flying Truck Pilot Flight Driving is new addition to Airplane Flight games and helicopter Simulation games.
